description: Defines data models for TV channels, EPG program items, VOD items, and user favorite items in the application.

classes.name: Channel
classes.description: Represents a TV channel in EPG.

classes.name: ProgramItem
classes.description: Represents one EPG program (a block on the timeline).

classes.name: FavoriteItem
classes.description: Represents a favorite item (can point to either VOD or Program).

classes.name: FavoriteType
classes.description: Enum class indicating the type of favorite item (VOD or PROGRAM).
